title: Sam Brown Hits the Waves in Los Angeles with the Surfing Rabbi
text:
Sam Brown Hits the Waves in Los Angeles with the Surfing Rabbi Samantha Brown has a surfing lesson of biblical proportions. iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
